subject: Hockey, Ice
Punjabi (Ethnic Group)
Television
lead_paragraph: A weekly show that calls games in Punjabi has married Canada’s pastime with the sounds of the Indian subcontinent, offering a glimpse at the changing face of hockey.
snippet: A weekly show that calls games in Punjabi has married Canada’s pastime with the sounds of the Indian subcontinent, offering a glimpse at the changing face of hockey.
